articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Baby Home, Orphanage in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Baby Home, Orphanage in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the baby home and orphanage in Pyongyang.
					 The first leg of his visit was the orphanage.
					
					 When he entered an amusement room of the orphanage, lovely children engrossed in cheerful playing vied with each other to come to his arms.
					
					 He gently patted children on the cheeks for a while in his arms. He kindly asked them how old they were and if they had any trouble.
					
					 The children, touched by the parental love and affection which they had longed for even in dreams, sang before him the song "Thank You, Marshal Kim Jong Un".
					
					 Saying that they have nothing to desire more in the world as he provided them with nice dresses in every season and sent them even confectionery, fishes, fruits and honey and they eagerly waited for him, they loudly called him "father!"
					
					 Going round different places of the orphanage, he acquainted himself in detail with the conditions for upbringing and education and living environment.
					
					 The next leg of his visit was the baby home.
					
					 At the baby room he, seeing with a smile on his face the sleeping babies, asked when they were born. Watching children playing in the playing room, he let them speak and happily smiled at them.
					
					 When seeing triplets, he let them sit on his knees. He recalled that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were very pleased whenever they were told about the birth of triplets, saying it was a good sign of prosperity of the country.
					
					 At the kitchen, he learned about what was served to the children. He was satisfied to know that the children at the baby home were well fed for their growth like those at the orphanage in the light of the science of nutrition.
					
					 He said that the children are the king of the country, adding that he would make sure that the children would be provided with 300 grams of fishes per day from this year.
					
					 He called for supplying not only meat and fish but nutritious dried persimmons to baby homes and orphanages on a regular basis.
					
					 Orphans long for affection more than others, he said, stressing the need to bring them up to be clever and upright as their parents failed to do so and let them stoutly grow free from the sorrow of being orphans so that they may be dependable pillars of the country. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un gave instructions valuable for improving the work of baby homes and orphanages.
					
					 Orphans are also successors to our revolution and pillars of the future, he said, stressing that it is the firm determination of our party to build up all baby homes and orphanages across the country at the same level as the revolutionary schools for the children of revolutionary martyrs.
					
					 Sumptuous meal, warm cradle and excellent educational conditions and environment are a prerequisite to raising children well, he said, adding that the party will build baby home and orphanage of Pyongyang City on the picturesque bank of Taedong River.
					
					 Underlining the need to spruce up baby homes and orphanages in provinces and the municipalities, he called for setting an example and generalizing it.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that nurses and teachers of baby homes and orphanages would put forward children as king of the country and uphold generation after generation Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's outlook on the rising generations as they showed loving care for children all their lives.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Jae Il, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Nominated as Candidate for Deputy to SPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Nominated as Candidate for Deputy to SPA
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK, was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly in reflection of the unanimous desire and absolute trust of all the service personnel in him.
					 A meeting of electorate took place with splendor at Paektusan Constituency No. 111 Monday to nominate Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the 13th SPA.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam and officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and KPA service personnel.
					
					 Vice Marshal of the KPA Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, made a report.
					
					 He said the path covered by the DPRK under the leadership of the Songun commander of Mt. Paektu is a sacred path in which it emerged victorious by dint of the spirit, pluck and gut of the supreme commander, and a gigantic path in which it created world-startling miracles and innovations.
					
					 Through their life experience the KPA service personnel keenly felt that the bright future of Songun Korea and the victory of building a thriving socialist nation, the lifelong desire and wish of the great Generalissimos, are guaranteed only when they follow the supreme commander.
					
					 He courteously proposed nominating Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the SPA of Paektusan Constituency No. 111 for the election of deputies to the 13th SPA carrying the unanimous desire and warm wishes of all the service personnel.
					
					 Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and other speakers expressed full support and approval for the proposal for nominating Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the SPA.
					
					 The meeting solemnly declared that Kim Jong Un was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the SPA of Paektusan Constituency No. 111 for the election of deputies to the 13th SPA according to the unanimous desire and warm support and approval of all the electorate. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Letter from Meeting of Electorate of Paektusan Constituency No. 111
articles.content:
Letter from Meeting of Electorate of Paektusan Constituency No. 111
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un Monday received a letter from the participants in a meeting of electorate of Paektusan Constituency No. 111 to nominate him as a candidate for deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The period in which Kim Jong Un has led the army and the people of the DPRK true to the intention of leader Kim Jong Il was a short time in the nation's history spanning five thousand years, but the feats he performed during the period are, indeed, the great feats that politicians can not do for a century and more.
					
					 The DPRK is giving full play to its dignity and might as an invincible power, while confidently advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism despite the world political upheaval. This is the proud fruition of Kim Jong Un's extraordinary wisdom, distinguished political caliber, matchless courage and pluck.
					
					 Therefore, the grand meeting of electorate decided with a unanimous approval to nominate Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the 13th SPA of the DPRK amid the full support and enthusiastic cheers of all the participants.
					
					 The letter expressed the determination to successfully fulfill the honorable mission and duty as the defender of the DPRK government, rallied close around the supreme commander.

articles.title: Meetings of Electorate Nominate Kim Jong Un as Candidate for Deputy to SPA
articles.content:
Meetings of Electorate Nominate Kim Jong Un as Candidate for Deputy to SPA
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Meetings of electorate took place at constituencies in Pyongyang, Sinuiju, Kanggye, Sariwon, Chongjin, Hamhung and Nampho cities and other areas and armed forces organs to nominate supreme leader Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK. 
					 Reports and speeches were made at the meetings. 
					
					 The reporters and speakers said Kim Jong Un clearly indicated a long-term strategy of the Korean revolution for advancing straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the uplifted great banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and has performed undying exploits for developing the DPRK. 
					
					 It is the true picture of the DPRK that all the service personnel and people uphold Kim Jong Un as the unitary center of unity and leadership and have built an invulnerable fortress, united close around him on the basis of the monolithic ideology, faith and revolutionary comradeship, going arms in arms and shoulder to shoulder with him, they said, and went on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have keenly realized through their life experience that a rosy future of Songun Korea and victory of the cause of building a thriving socialist nation are in store only when they follow Kim Jong Un endowed with outstanding ideas and theories, distinguished leadership art and noble traits. 
					
					 The reporters at the meetings courteously proposed nominating Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the 13th SPA reflecting the unanimous desire and ardent wishes of all the service personnel and people. The speakers and electors expressed full support and approval of the proposal. 
					
					 The meetings solemnly declared that Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the SPA of the relevant constituencies for the election of deputies to the 13th SPA by the unanimous desire and full support and approval of all electors.
					
					 Letters to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Personnel Celebrate Kim Jong Un's Nomination as Candidate for Deputy to SPA
articles.content:
Personnel Celebrate Kim Jong Un's Nomination as Candidate for Deputy to SPA
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- There took place a dancing party of the service personnel of Paektusan Constituency No. 111 on Monday in celebration of nominating Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and service personnel.
					
					 The dancing party began amid the playing of "Song of Election".
					
					 The participants danced, extending the greatest honor and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un who has developed the Korean People's Army into an invincible revolutionary elite army, glorifying the undying state-building exploits performed by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					  They danced to the tune of songs "Fortune of Korea" and "Our Socialism Is the Best in the World". Their faces shone with great pride and self-esteem of firmly defending the revolutionary power of the people with arms, holding the peerless Songun commander in high esteem.
					
					  The atmosphere of the dancing party reached climax amid the playing of songs "Song of Airman" and "At One Go" which reflect the optimism of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army rushing like storm at a-match-for-a-hundred speed for offensive while winning victory after victory in defending socialism and bringing happiness to the people under the leadership of the supreme commander.
					
					  The dancing party ended with song "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives". It showed well the firm faith and will of the service personnel to defend the people's power with Paektusan arms and discharge their duty as the scouting party and strong mainstay of the Songun revolution in building a thriving nation, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Tunisian PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Tunisian PM
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Mehdi Jomaa upon his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Tunisia.
					 Pak in the message expressed the expectation and conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the prime minister success in his work for achieving the political stability and economic prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The participants in the national meeting of sub-workteam heads in the field of agriculture on Tuesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the immortality halls they paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display in reflection of the Korean people and the world progressives' profound reverence for them and halls that house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: National Symposium Held to Glorify Exploits of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
National Symposium Held to Glorify Exploits of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A national symposium took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to deeply grasp and add luster to the imperishable exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il for modeling whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 Read at the symposium were papers explaining and proving the undying exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the development of the ideological work of the Workers' Party of Korea and the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who provided the banner of eternal victory of the Juche revolution by setting it as the supreme programme of the party to model whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Among them were papers dealing with tasks and ways for thoroughly establishing the monolithic leadership system of the WPK.
					
					 Deputy Editor-in-Chief of Rodong Sinmun Kim Il Ryong said the proclamation of the programme for modeling whole society on Kimilsungism marked an epochal occasion in providing the fundamental guarantee for firmly ensuring the party's unitary leadership of the ideological work and a historic event which brought about a revolutionary turn in improving and rounding off the party's ideological work system and propaganda and agitation method.
					
					 Cha Yong Myong, rector of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, clarified that Kim Jong Il brought up all the service personnel and people to be strong in ideology and faith by giving a definite priority to the ideological education and brought about a great leap forward and innovations in each age of revolution by dynamically conducting the political work to give fullest play to the mental power of all the service personnel and people.
					
					 Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University who is also minister of Higher Education, referred to the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by providing the most perfect idea and theory in our era and strong political ranks, invincible military power and powerful material and economic guarantee for imbuing whole society with one idea.
					
					 Jon Ha Chol, director of an institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, said the great cause of imbuing whole society with the revolutionary idea of the leader has been steadily carried forward and developed in depth in the new century of Juche, too, to bring about unprecedented changes in the drive for building a thriving nation and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, adding this would have been unthinkable without the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ryu Yong Sik, vice-director of the Political Bureau of the Cabinet, said: It is necessary to thoroughly establish the unitary leadership system of Kim Jong Un in order to firmly ensure the accomplishment of the cause of modeling whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. 
					
					 Present at the symposium were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of the party, administrative and working people's organizations of national level and in Pyongyang City, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and art and media, those in the field for preserving revolutionary relics and those of the organs for training party cadres.

articles.title: Plenary Meeting of DWUK Held
articles.content:
Plenary Meeting of DWUK Held
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The 66th plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) took place here on Monday. 
					 Members of the Central Committee of the DWUK were present there. 
					
					 Officials of the Central Committee attended it as observers. 
					
					 The plenary meeting decided an organizational issue. 
					
					 Ro Song Sil was relieved of her post and Kim Jong Sun was elected as chairwoman of the Central Committee of the DWUK.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., UAWK Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., UAWK Held
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The 68th Enlarged Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) took place in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 It discussed tasks to be fulfilled by UAWK organizations to devotedly carry out important tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and more thoroughly establish the monolithic leadership system of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Ri Myong Gil, chairman of C.C., the UAWK, made a report at the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the meeting will mark an important occasion in giving play to the mental power of the officials of the UAWK and agricultural workers in the efforts to occupy without fail the grain goal set by the party this significant year marking the 50th anniversary of the theses on socialist rural question.
					
					 They underscored the need for UAWK organizations at all levels to dynamically conduct the ideological work in various forms and methods so that all members of the UAWK may become strong ones in the idea and faith stoutly carrying forward the lineage of Mt. Paektu in any adversity and true patriotic farmers upholding the party with rice, holding President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever.
					
					 They called upon UAWK organizations to take it as the lifeline to establish the monolithic leadership system of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They stressed the need for UAWK officials and members to raise a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward on the agricultural front, the major thrust for economic construction and improvement of the people's standard of living, under the guidance of the great party and thus hit the grain production goal this year without fail.
					
					 Decisions were adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Present there were members and alternate members of the C.C., the UAWK and its officials in Pyongyang and local areas.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Contest Opens
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Prize Sports Contest opened with due ceremony at the Ice Rink Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Players will compete at 10 events such as basketball, volleyball, table tennis, skiing and ice hockey in Pyongyang, Samjiyon and other places.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier, officials concerned and sports persons in Pyongyang.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Ri Jong Mu in an opening address said that the contest will show high enthusiasm of sports persons across the country to glorify forever the immortal feats Kim Jong Il performed for developing the sports of the country and successfully realize the party's plan for building a sports power. 
					
					 He noted that the proud achievements were made last year under the warm care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is showing profound benevolence for sports persons while paying deep attention to the country's sports, and they greatly encouraged the army and people to perform new feats.
					
					 The ceremony was followed by men's ice hockey game between the Taesongsan Sports Team and the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team.

articles.title: Best Footballers of DPRK for 2013
articles.content:
Best Footballers of DPRK for 2013
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Pak Kwang Ryong of the Kigwancha Sports Team and Ho Un Byol of the April 25 Sports Team were selected as the best man and woman footballers of the DPRK for Juche 102 (2013). 
					 Pak Kwang Ryong and Ho Un Byol contributed to making DPRK emerge winner at last year's international football tournaments.
					
					 Pak, now active in FC Basel of Switzerland, scored three goals in men's football matches of the 6th East Asian Games.
					
					 Ho, named top scorer at the 2013 East Asian Cup, distinguished herself as a competent forward at the 6th East Asian Games. She was awarded the title of Merited Athlete in December last year.

articles.title: Namhung Youth Chemical Complex Boosts Fertilizer Production
articles.content:
Namhung Youth Chemical Complex Boosts Fertilizer Production
 Anju, February 4 (KCNA) -- Workers of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex are producing hundreds of tons of more fertilizer than their daily quota these days.
					 Workers of the moulding shop and the gas producing shop are making a signal boost in production by improving the maintenance of equipment and technical control and raising the operation rate of gas producers.
					
					 Those in the gas refining shop and the ammonia producing shop are energetically pushing forward the gas refining and synthesis while increasing production of ammonia.
					
					 The compressor shop and coal supply shop are successfully ensuring the supply of steam and raw materials, etc., contributing to boosting production.
					
					 Workers of the complex are boosting production every day, prompted by their single determination to fully ensure the supply of fertilizers to farms this year.

articles.title: Silver Sculpture, Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Silver Sculpture, Gift to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- On display at the International Friendship Exhibition House is a silver sculpture "Tiger", which was presented to leader Kim Jong Il by the president of Russian International Charity Fund "Protectors of Arts for the Century" on the occasion of his birthday.
					 Through his visits to the DPRK, the president was deeply moved by Kim Jong Il's personality. 
					
					 The president prepared the gift, symbolic of bravery and wisdom, with sincerity in February Juche 96 (2007). 
					
					 It is one of the gifts he presented to Kim Jong Il with deep reverence for him.
					
					 Seen on the sculpture is a message wishing Kim Jong Il good health.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts US for Sparking Worldwide Nuclear Arms Race
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts US for Sparking Worldwide Nuclear Arms Race
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has stockpiled about 7,400 nuclear warheads of various types at present and 2 130 of which are ready for use in actions, according to a report "2014 U.S. nuclear energy" released by the U.S. magazine Bulletin of Atomic Scientist.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is making desperate efforts to turn the world into a unipolar one dominated by it, styling itself the "world's only superpower" since the demise of the Cold War era.
					
					 The U.S. has touted much about the "building of a world without nuclear weapons" in face of the protest and denunciation from the world peace-loving people but stepped up the moves for modernizing the nuclear weapons behind the scene, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Regarding nukes as the most powerful means for carrying out its strategy for world domination, Washington is going in the direction of equipping the aging nukes with latest technology and replacing them with improved new type nukes.
					
					 Having deployed 60 percent of the nuclear submarines in the Asia-Pacific region including the waters around the Korean peninsula, it has in place a prompt nuclear strike system aimed at its targets.
					
					  The U.S. nuclear arms build-up in the region prompts those countries in it to take military counter-measures, sparking off a worldwide nuclear arms race.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal posing a nuclear threat and sparking off arms race, throwing humankind into constant nuclear horror.
					
					 In case a nuclear disaster occurs, the U.S. will not be safe either.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised not to fool the international community but to genuinely opt for denuclearization, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japanese PM over Yasukuni Visit
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japanese PM over Yasukuni Visit
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe talked nonsense at a recent international meeting that the world should understand his visit to Yasukuni Shrine and that he behaved just like leaders of various countries of the world who prayed for the soul of those who fought for their countries with respect for them. He blustered that visits to the shrine would go on in the future, too, as Japan aspires after global peace.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Abe uttered is little short of an open declaration that Japan would take the road of reinvading Asia by repeating the history of the past aggression.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that Abe would justify the visit to the shrine and put it into practice in the future. 
					
					 Japan has already made almost all the preparations for overseas aggression in all aspects.
					
					 What remains to be done now is to create a social atmosphere for reinvasion.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are painting war criminals as "heroes" and "patriots" through the visit to the shrine in a bid to instill the idea of praising the history of aggression and giving a steady continuity to it into the Japanese instead of imbuing them with guilty conscience. 
					
					 It is hypocrisy for them to assert that they will not start a war.
					
					 They are keen to hurl the Japanese armed with the idea of militarism into overseas aggression if the time for doing so gets mature.
					
					 They had better stop at once their rash militarist actions, not forgetting  the bitter lesson the Japanese imperialists drew from the defeat they suffered in their Asian aggression, warns  the commentary.

articles.title: KCNA on Abe's Policy Speech
articles.content:
KCNA  on Abe's Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, Japanese Prime Minister Abe made a policy speech, in which he called for dialogue accompanied with pressure while talking about "package solution to the abduction, nuclear and missile issues". Such remarks could be heard from the Japanese foreign minister on the same day.
					 Those reckless remarks made by the Japanese ultra-rightist forces led by Abe remind everyone of a thief crying "Stop thief!" as they are intended for reversing the tide of daily-increasing international denunciation against Japan and thus creating a favorable atmosphere for their moves of militarizing Japan.
					
					 Their rash acts evoking much criticism in Asia have something in common with the war hysteria whipped up by Hitler in Germany after its defeat in the First World War.
					
					 As well known, the First World War ended with the collapse of militarism in Germany, but fascist maniac Hitler's assumption to power plunged many nations of the world into the bloodbath of another world war. 
					
					 Prompted by the wild ambition for reoccupying former colonies and, furthermore, building up a new vast empire in the world, Hitler had incited ultra-chauvinism and revanchism and restored the economy serving only for war in Germany. Over-heated in reinvasion, Hitler annexed neighboring countries one after another and, after all, unleashed the Second World War.
					
					 Abe's reckless moves are little different to those of Hitler.
					
					 Now Japan is running headlong into militarism for reinvasion and Abe is taking the lead in it. Soon after taking power, he impudently sang "Kimigayo", symbolic of militarism, and called for restoring "strong Japan".
					
					 During his administration, Japan has made almost all the political and institutional preparations for militarization and overseas aggression with the adoption of new "defense programme guidelines", "mid-term defense capability buildup outline" and "national security strategy" after the organization of the "National Security Council".
					
					 Japan's "Self-Defence Forces" have already turned into a completely offensive one.
					
					 Revision of "Pacifist Constitution", which bans Japan from going to war, enters the final stage. In the teeth of the international concern about Japan, which has turned into a war state, Abe visited the Yasukuni Shrine that enshrines war criminals, including Tozyo who branded as "Hitler in Asia", a revelation of his wild ambition to provoke the second "greater east Asia war". 
					
					 His ambition for reinvasion has driven the equilibrium of confrontation and friction to an extreme phase in the Asian region. 
					
					 In the past Hitler called for a fight against communism to justify the war, but at present Abe is trumpeting the theory of confrontation with the DPRK to rationalize the militarization of Japan for reinvasion. There is no difference between them.
					
					 Though Japan is clinging to every possible cunning plot to justify and bring back its crime-woven past, it can never work on the international community.
					
					 Abe, plagued with militarism, had better bring himself to his senses. A key to improved DPRK-Japan relations lies in Japan's sincere liquidation of its past crimes.

articles.title: Damage by Oil Outflow in South Korea
articles.content:
Damage by Oil Outflow in South Korea
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- There occurred an incident of oil outflow in the sea off Ryosu, South Jolla Province in south Korea on Jan. 31, entailing big damage, according to KBS of south Korea. 
					 An oil tanker collided with a landing bridge while mooring at the port. The collision wrecked the oil pipeline, causing a large amount of spill.  
					
					 The spilt oil is flowing to the nearby fishing grounds, 2-3 km from the accident spot, damaging shellfish and other breeding grounds and fishing grounds.
					
					 Pollution damage will increase as much oil got stuck to rocks and sand, it reported.

articles.title: Imprisonment Demanded for Those Related to UPP Case in S. Korea
articles.content:
Imprisonment Demanded for Those Related to UPP Case in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean prosecution on Feb. 3 demanded 20 years in jail and 10 years of suspension of qualification for Ri Sok Gi, a lawmaker from the Unified Progressive Party, on  charges of attempting a rebellion, etc. according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The prosecution claimed that he "instructed his organization members to make military preparations for a riot, etc." and that it is necessary to severely punish him.
					
					 It also demanded 15 years in prison and 10 years of suspension of qualification for Hong Sun Sok and four others and 10 years in jail and 10 years of suspension of qualification for Han Tong Gun.

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Creating Climate for Mending North-South Relations
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Creating Climate for Mending North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Hailin City branch of the General Association of Koreans in China on January 29 made public a statement titled "It is necessary to establish climate for improved north-south relations by concerted efforts of our nation". 
					 The statement recalled that the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in its crucial proposal and open letter to the south Korean authorities called for taking mutual practical measures to prevent nuclear disaster on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					The proposal of the DPRK is the very just and patriotic one as it reflects the aspiration of all Koreans desirous of national security, peace and prosperity and the requirements of the times, it said, and went on:
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities insulted the north's compatriotic magnanimity as "camouflaged peace offensive" and "pretext for provocation", blaring that they would stage the aggressive joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, which have been held every year, from late February this year, earlier than the preceding ones. 
					
					 If a nuclear war breaks out on the Korean peninsula owing to the reckless military confrontation racket of the U.S. and south Korean authorities, its consequences will be very serious. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities sincerely want nuclear-free world, peace of the Korean peninsula and improved north-south relations, they should stop hostile acts of threatening and slandering fellow countrymen by introducing foreign nuclear weapons.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities respond to the north's proposal with military confrontation despite the unanimous demand of Koreans at home and abroad aspiring after national reconciliation and unity, improved north-south relations, peace and prosperity, they will certainly be denounced and rejected by all Koreans.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Kyrgyz Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Kyrgyz Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, great leader of the Korean people, was an ardent revolutionary and peerless patriot who dedicated himself to the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness.
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan, said this in his statement issued on January 27 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il firmly defended the sovereignty of socialist Korea by resolutely smashing the vicious moves of the imperialist allied forces headed by the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 He also developed the Workers' Party of Korea into a mother party serving the people, further consolidated the harmonious whole of the leader, party and masses as firm as a rock and provided a foundation for bringing about a radical turn in economic construction and improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 The DPRK emerged as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and brought about world-startling miracles and innovations in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Progressive humankind lauds Kim Jong Il for his immortal exploits.

articles.title: DPRK's Greatest Holidays to Be Marked in Mongolia
articles.content:
DPRK's Greatest Holidays to Be Marked in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on January 29.
					 L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, and D. Michka, member of the Guidance Council of the Mongolian Peace and Friendship Organization, were elected co-chairmen of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and hold diverse political and cultural events including film show, photo exhibition and celebration performance between January 29 and April 20.

articles.title: Proposal of NDC of DPRK Supported by Personages of Tajikistan, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Proposal of NDC of DPRK Supported by Personages of Tajikistan, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Personages of Tajikistan and Bangladesh extended full support to the crucial proposal made by the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, noted in a statement on January 24:
					
					 The NDC of the DPRK urged the south Korean authorities to stop hostile military acts and slandering each other and establish a climate for mending the north-south relations and clarified its stand to take a practical action first.
					
					 We sincerely hope that the crucial proposal of the NDC of the DPRK will be implemented to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula and create a favorable climate for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The Korean people will certainly reunify the country as long as they are under the tested and seasoned leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and all service personnel and people are single-mindedly united around him.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said in his statement issued on January 22:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respond to the crucial proposal of the NDC of the DPRK without delay.
					
					 We fully support the above-said proposal for improving the north-south relations and ensuring peace and stability on the peninsula.

articles.title: Proposal of NDC of DPRK Supported by Organizations of DR Congo, Sweden
articles.content:
Proposal of NDC of DPRK Supported by Organizations of DR Congo, Sweden
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Organizations of the DR Congo and Sweden made public statements on January 27 and 28 in support of the crucial proposal of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association said that the crucial proposal sent by the NDC of the DPRK to the south Korean authorities is acceptable to any Korean and it is a special measure to practically create a peaceful climate for Korea's reunification. It went on:
					
					 We fully support the crucial proposal which called for reunifying the country with concerted efforts of the Korean nation by preventing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and achieving national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not turn away their face from the sincere efforts of the DPRK to open up a fresh phase of national reunification but face up to the trend of the times and opt for reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea should no longer allow the U.S. interference in the Korean issue, bearing in mind that in case a war breaks out again on the peninsula, its victim is the Korean people only, not the U.S.
					
					 The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association stated:
					
					 We are sure that the crucial proposal of the NDC of the DPRK is very constructive.
					
					 It is natural and necessary for Sweden to positively support the DPRK's crucial proposal for defusing tension and resuming dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south.
					
					 We appeal to the government, political parties and media of Sweden to support the proposal and thus make a contribution to the DPRK's efforts to defuse tension and ensure the peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of British Organization
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on January 26.
					 The work, made public on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea serve as an effective political mode in our era, which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to arms, and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the era and revolution.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated by Regional Organization
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated by Regional Organization
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on January 24.
					 Its inaugural resolution said:
					
					 February 16 this year is a significant day marking the 72nd birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 All members of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions are filled with the single determination to add more shine to the august name of Kim Jong Il, deeply revering him on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					
					 Imperishable are the feats performed by Kim Jong Il in accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, reunifying the country, checking the world imperialists' aggression and developing and enriching the Juche idea and Songun politics.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's works serve as must textbooks to be read by us to grasp his idea on the most important issues of the present era and find a correct solution to them.
					
					 Our alliance organizes the preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star in order to hold in a planned manner diverse events including a seminar on his great exploits and works on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					
					 Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the alliance, Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, and Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected executive secretaries of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Tajikistan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Tajikistan
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Dushanbe on January 28.
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre asilo para ninos y orfanato en Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre asilo para ninos y orfanato en Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el asilo para ninos y el orfanato en esta capital.
					Estuvo primero en el orfanato.
					
					Cuando el aparecio en la sala de juegos, cayeron en sus brazos los ninos que se divertian.
					
					El Mariscal acaricio un rato por la mejilla a los ninos abrazados y les pregunto en tono carinoso que edad tienen y si no padecen alguna enfermedad. 
					
					Conmovidos por el afecto paternal, los ninos interpretaron delante de el la cancion "!Gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un!"
					
					Le llamaron a toda voz como "!Padre!" diciendo que no tienen nada que envidiar en este mundo porque el Mariscal les envia en cada estacion del ano las ropas bonitas, caramelos y galletas sabrosos, pescados, frutas y mieles.
					
					En su recorrido por varios puntos del orfanato, el Mariscal se cercioro de las condiciones de crianza y educacion y del ambiente de vida.
					
					Seguidamente, se dirigio al asilo para ninos.
					
					En la habitacion de bebes, miro sonriente a los bebes dormidos y pregunto cuando nacieron. Al distinguir a los ninos que jugaban en el salon de diversiones, converso con ellos esbozando una sonrisa. 
					
					Se reunio con los trillizos y los sento en sus rodillas. 
					
					Cada vez que recibian el informe de nacimiento de trillizos, los Generalisimos (el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il) se ponian muy contentos diciendo que eso es una senal de la prosperidad del pais, recordo.
					
					En la cocina averiguo que alimentos les dan a los ninos y se mostro complacido de que al igual que el orfanato, el asilo alimentara bien a los ninos segun la norma nutricional para el crecimiento.
					
					Dijo que les alimentara todos los dias desde el ano en curso 300 gramos de pescados, reiterando que los ninos son los reyes en nuestro pais.
					
					Ademas de la carne y pescado, hay que dar de comer a los matriculados de asilo y orfanato hasta el caqui seco de alto valor nutritivo, indico.
					
					Los huerfanos anoran mas que nadie el afecto, recalco y exhorto a formarlos en lugar de sus padres como personas honestas y futuros trabajadores del pais sin que ellos sufran la tristeza de orfandad.
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal dio valiosas instrucciones que se presentan en mejorar la gestion del orfanato y el asilo.
					
					Apuntando que los ninos sin padres son tambien los sucesores de nuestra revolucion y dignos trabajadores del futuro, puntualizo que el partido tiene la firme decision de acondicionar los orfanatos y asilos para ninos de todo el pais en el nivel de las escuelas revolucionarias donde se forman los hijos de martires revolucionarios.
					
					Ofrecer comidas sabrosas, alojamiento comodo, excelentes condiciones y ambiente de educacion deviene la premisa de formacion excelente de los ninos, senalo y continuo que el partido construira nuevamente a la pintoresca ribera del rio Taedong el orfanato y el asilo para ninos de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Instruyo acondicionar nuevamente conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo los mismos edificios en todas las provincias y las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro. 
					
					Anadio que se debe escoger primero el edificio ejemplar y generalizalo a todo el pais.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que las nineras y asistentes del orfanato y el asilo materializaran generacion tras generacion la concepcion de las generaciones venideras del Presidente y el Dirigente quienes amaban mucho durante toda su vida a los ninos presentandolos como reyes del pais.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Jae Il, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un elegido como candidato a diputado a la APS
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un elegido como candidato a diputado a la APS
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Segun el deseo unanime y confianza absoluta de todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del pueblo, Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC, fue elegido como candidato a diputado a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema en el colegio del distrito electoral Paektusan no. 111 que tuvo lugar con solemnidad el dia 3. 
					Asistieron a la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam y otros funcionarios del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae. 
					
					El informante dijo que bajo la guia del General Insigne del Songun del monte Paektu, la RPDC recorrio un trayecto sagrado logrando victorias con el temperamento y audacia del Comandante Supremo y registrando milagros e innovaciones que sorprenden a todo el mundo. 
					
					A traves de sus vivencias, los oficiales y soldados del EPC sintieron en carne propia la verdad de que en seguir la guia del Comandante Supremo residen el futuro maravilloso de la Corea del Songun y la victoria de la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, deseada tanto por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, apunto. 
					
					Recogiendo el unanime y fuerte deseo de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC, propuso cortesmente elegir al Mariscal como candidato a diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema del distrito electoral Paektusan no. 111. 
					
					Le siguieron en hacer uso de la palabra el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, y el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Jang Jong Nam, y otros, quienes expresaron apoyo total a dicha propuesta. 
					
					En el colegio fue declarada la eleccion de Kim Jong Un como candidato al diputado a la APS. 
					
					En la ocasion fue aprobada una carta dirigida al Mariscal.

articles.title: Tiene lugar seminario nacional para asimilar proezas de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar seminario nacional para asimilar proezas de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el seminario nacional para estudiar y asimilar profundamente las imborrables proezas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizadas para el cumplimiento de la causa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo. 
					En la ocasion se presentaron las disertaciones que argumentan las proezas del Dirigente acumuladas por el desarrollo de la labor ideologica del partido, la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quien al presentar la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo como maximo programa del partido, preparo la eterna base para la victoria de la revolucion del Juche, las tareas y remedios para establecer estrictamente el sistema de unica direccion del partido. 
					
					El subeditor jefe del diario Rodong Sinmun, Kim Il Ryong, dijo que la proclamacion del programa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo fue un motivo de viraje que garantizo fundamentalmente la unica direccion del partido sobre la labor ideologica y un acontecimiento historico que abrio la coyuntura de cambio revolucionario para mejorar y perfeccionar el sistema de la labor ideologica del partido y los metodos de propaganda y agitacion. 
					
					El director de la Escuela Superior del Partido Kim Il Sung, Cha Yong Myong, enfatizo que al dar prioridad a la educacion ideologica, el Dirigente formo a todos los militares y civiles como los fuertes en la ideologia y conviccion y desarrollo con dinamismo la labor politica para poner de pleno manifiesto la fuerza espiritual de los militares y civiles para que se registraran grandes saltos e innovaciones en todas las decadas de la revolucion coreana. 
					
					El rector de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior, Thae Hyong Chol, puntualizo que la proeza del Dirigente es que el presento la mas perfecta ideologia y teoria de nuestra epoca, la fuerte fuerza politica, el invencible poderio militar y la firme garantia material y economica que posibilitan identificar toda la sociedad segun la unica idea. 
					
					El presidente de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, Jon Ha Chol, afirmo que al margen de la probada y destacada guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un no se puede pensar en la realidad orgullosa de hoy en que continua y se desarrolla tambien en la nueva centuria del Juche la magna causa para identificar toda la sociedad segun la idea revolucionaria del lider y se alcanzan relevantes cambios no vistos en la construccion de un Estado prospero y en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					El subjefe del Departamento Politico del Consejo de Ministros, Ryu Yong Sik, apunto que establecer estrictamente el sistema de unica guia del Mariscal es la firme garantia para el cumplimiento de la causa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo. 
					
					Participaron en el seminario el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, los funcionarios de los organismos de partido y administracion, entidades de masas, instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, la rama de conservacion de materiales historico-revolucionarios, y organos de formacion de funcionarios partidistas en el centro y la ciudad de Pyongyang.

articles.title: ACNC comenta discurso sobre politica  gubernamental de Abe
articles.content:
ACNC comenta discurso sobre politica  gubernamental de Abe
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- En el reciente discurso sobre la politica gubernamental, el premier Abe volvio a hablar del "dialogo y presion" en cuanto a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pretextando la "solucion integral del problema de secuestro, armas nucleares y misiles". El mismo dia, el canciller japones tambien lo imito. 
					Tales disparates de las fuerzas ultraderechistas encabezadas por Abe devienen una artimana astuta para apaciguar el creciente clima de criticas anti-Japon de la sociedad internacional y preparar un ambiente favorable a la militarizacion del pais. 
					
					Y hacen recordar a Hitler que despues de la primera guerra mundial infundia el fervor de guerra en Alemania derrotada con la ambicion de nueva agresion. 
					
					Como esta conocido por todos, la primera guerra mundial desatada en Europa hace un siglo llevo el fracaso al militarismo aleman, pero, la aparicion del maniaco fascista Hitler  trajo los desastres de otra guerra mundial. 
					
					Con la ambicion de rescatar las colonias y fundar un nuevo imperio colonial en el mundo mas vasto, Hitler repuso en funcionamiento la economia de guerra insistiendo en el  extremo chovinismo nacional y el revanchismo. 
					
					Inflado por el fervor de nueva agresion, anexo a fuerza uno tras otro a los paises vecinos y por fin, provoco la segunda guerra mundial. 
					
					Aunque son diferentes el tiempo y la nacion, el mundo ve ahora el resurgimiento de esa historia. 
					
					Hoy dia, Abe esta al frente de Japon que se dirige a la reagresion militarista. 
					
					Inmediatamente despues de su mandato, Abe abogo por rescatar "Japon poderoso" cantando abiertamente la cancion "Kimigayo", simbolo del militarismo. 
					
					En el mandato de Abe, Japon instituyo  el consejo de seguridad nacional y perfecciono todos los preparativos politicos e institucionales para la militarizacion y la nueva agresion. A citar ejemplos, aprobo el nuevo programa de defensa, el plan de arreglo de fuerzas defensivas de tiempo intermedio y la estrategia de seguridad nacional. 
					
					Las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" ya se han convertido completamente en las fuerzas armadas de caracter ofensivo. 
					
					La enmienda de la "constitucion de paz" que prohibe la guerra espera la aprobacion final. 
					
					Pese a la preocupacion de la sociedad internacional por Japon convertido en el Estado de guerra, Abe visito otra vez el santuario Yasukuni donde estan conservados los restos mortales de Tojo, reconocido como "Hitler de Asia", y otros criminales de guerra, demostrando asi la ambicion de provocar la segunda "guerra de gran Asia Oriental". 
					
					La ambicion de nueva agresion de Abe ya llevan al limite la estructura de enfrentamiento y antagonismo del continente asiatico. 
					
					Son iguales la locura del fascista Hitler, que abogaba por el combate anticomunista para justificar la guerra, y el proceder de Abe que insiste en el enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para justificar la nueva agresion militarista. 
					
					Pero, la artimana astuta de Japon de justificar y rehabilitar su pasado ensangrentado no puede ganar ningun apoyo ni consentimiento de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					Lo mas importante para la mejora de las relaciones Corea-Japon es la liquidacion del pasado del pais isla.
